channel.description: Fashion and Trends Articles – Find articles and stories based on Today’s Fashion and Trends in Indian Culture. These articles help you to understand what kind of trends is becoming more popular in today’s lifestyle.

image.title: Fashion and Trends Articles, Latest Fashion Trends News Stories | Hindustan Times

item.title: From trendy jumpsuits to evening gowns: Top 6 upcoming fashion trends for 2023
item.description: Whether you're a fashionista or just looking to refresh your wardrobe, here are top fashion trends that are taking the world by storm. Get ready to be inspired, because these trends are sure to make a statement and turn heads wherever you go.

item.title: Hina Khan's sizzling pics in white cut-out swimsuit in the Maldives set the temperatures soaring. Check out inside
item.description: Hina Khan dropped new pictures from her Maldives holiday. It shows the star chilling in the infinity pool dressed in a white cut-out swimsuit and setting the temperatures soaring in the Maldives. Check it out inside.

item.title: Sneaker hacks: Creative ways to style your sneakers for any occasion
item.description: From classic and minimalist to bold and statement-making, here are some amazing styling tips that will help you make a statement with your sneakers and stand out from the crowd.

item.title: Anushka Sharma and Virat Kohli's colourful comfy clothes for airport gets love from fans: 'These two are so real...'
item.description: Anushka Sharma and Virat Kohli got clicked at the airport today on Valentine's Day. The couple's comfy colourful airport look got love from their fans, who commented, "These two are so real." Check out the pictures and video.

item.title: Valentine's Day 2023: Unique nail art inspiration to celebrate the day of love
item.description: Whether you prefer simple and elegant designs or more elaborate and playful ones, these ideas will inspire you to celebrate the day of love in a unique and stylish way.

item.title: Bhumi Pednekar dazzles in shimmery lehenga-choli at Sidharth Malhotra -Kiara Advani wedding reception
item.description: Bhumi Pednekar looked every bit gorgeous in a stunning glittery blouse and saree-style lehenga at the star-studded wedding reception of Sidharth Malhotra -Kiara Advani. Check out her glam pics below.

item.title: Super herb: Benefits of rosemary water for great hair
item.description: While social media has many beauty influencers touting the use of rosemary, we spoke to experts to exploring this trend.

item.title: Social media makeup trend: How to get the cold girl makeup look?
item.description: While winter maybe on its way out, you can still get the viral look with some tips by these make experts.

item.title: Sidharth Malhotra-Kiara Advani reception: Akash Ambani-Shloka Mehta, Alia Bhatt, other stars make a dazzling appearance
item.description: Sidharth Malhotra and Kiara Advani's wedding reception: Kiara and Sidharth hosted a grand reception party last night attended by Akash Ambani and Shloka Mehta, Alia Bhatt, Kareena Kapoor, Karan Johar, Gauri Khan, and more celebrities. Check out who wore what to the event inside.

item.title: Want a glow up on Valentine's Day? Here are 7 skincare trends dominating 2023
item.description: As you prep up for Valentine's Day, take a glance at skin's future and get ready for the top skincare trends of 2023 roundup from anti-stress treatments to DIY beauty tricks, skinimalism and biggest Korean-beauty secrets
